parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Takes index of a row as a parameter. Returns index of the closest header above this row.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ctrl '''ctFindRowHeader''' row

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_index = _control [[ctFindRowHeader]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
</value></part></template></root>
